index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: Relating to the Police Department; authorizing execution of an agreement with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for joint law enforcement activities in support of "Operation Safe Home," accepting the money when received; increasing the 1997 Budget of the Police Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
